name: That Floaty Feeling
description:
That Float Feeling is a 2D Physics Puzzle Platformer, explore the depths of the mind to find your emotions, and navigate the world with your feelings.

This was made for TOJam 2021 - Once more with Feeling

Created by...

Programmers - Amelia McLeavey, Fred Duffield, Joseph Ballantyne, Zoë Pilgrim

Gameplay Design - Joseph Ballantyne

3D Modelers -   Kerry Liang, Kyle (Kai) Brunton, Taylor Moffat

2D Artists - Monica Cao, Taylor Moffat

Level Designers -Sam Geronimo, Vincent Le 

VFX Artist - Nathan Arcari

Sound Designer - Benny Chung

Composer - Benny Chung

Producer - Kyle (Kai) Brunton
